price: 8. Waxaad ku dhahdaa: Geerida aad ka carartaan, way idinla kulmi, markaasaa dib la idiinku soo celin xagga (Alle) Ogsoonaha waxa aan muuqan iyo waxa muuqda,  Wuxuuna idiin sheegi (idinka jaazeyn) waxaad camal fali jirteen.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ ٱلَّذِي تَفِرُّونَ مِنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ مُلَٰقِيكُمۡۖ ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul inna al-mawta alladhī tafirrūna min'hu fa-innahu mulāqīkum thumma turaddūna ilā ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
